Plot: After the Bergens invade Troll Village, Poppy, the happiest Troll ever born, and the curmudgeonly Branch set off on a journey to rescue her friends.
Title: Trolls
Writer: Jonathan Aibel (screenplay), Glenn Berger (screenplay), Erica Rivinoja (story by), Thomas Dam (based on the Good Luck Trolls created by)
Actors: Anna Kendrick, Justin Timberlake, Zooey Deschanel, Christopher Mintz-Plasse
